name: Senior Seminar in Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
description: An in-depth examination of selected issues in the theatre at the 400 level. Special Topics vary for Breadth distribution depending on the course content and therefore may be counted towards Groups A or B. Please consult the Undergraduate Drama office or check the program’s website for more details.
department: Centre for Drama, Theatre and Performance Studies
prerequisites: DRM220Y1/DRM230Y1; 14 FCE, Specialist or Major in Drama and/or permission of the instructor.
